narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Shopno 1, LLC is a Home Health Aide provider based in Jackson Heights, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $55.9M in Medicaid payments across 354K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $55.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
